thread.title: California law firm offers free Uber rides on New Year's Eve | KTLA
thread.title_full: California law firm offers free Uber rides on New Year's Eve | KTLA

author: Iman Palm
title: California law firm offers free Uber rides on New Year's Eve | KTLA
text:
A California law firm is offering free Uber rides to residents on New Year’s Eve to ensure people get home safely.
Setareh Law is offering about 300 vouchers on a first-come, first-served basis. Instructions for redeeming the free voucher are available here. Riders must have an Uber account to redeem the voucher, which covers rides up to $20.
The voucher is valid for rides to and from the following California counties:
- Los Angeles
- Orange
- Riverside
- San Bernardino
- San Diego
- San Francisco
- San Mateo
- Alameda
- Contra Costa
- Santa Clara
- Sacramento
- Fresno
- San Joaquin
- Stanislaus
- Sonoma
- Kern
- Ventura
- Madera
- Monterey
During the California Highway Patrol’s New Year’s Holiday Enforcement Period last year, the agency reported 10 fatal crashes and 481 arrests statewide for driving under the influence.
Similarly, from 6 p.m. Christmas Eve until 11:59 p.m. Christmas Day, officers made 297 DUI arrests.
